attributes.action: fighting against planned building of flats between Tendring Court and Tillingham Bold, Woodland Avenue, Hutton
attributes.additional_details:
Us, the undersigned, are against planning permission on flats between Tendring Court and Tillingham Bold, Woodland Avenue, Hutton, Brentwood, Essex.

It will effect alll residents already living in the surrounding area. The area suggested is not big enough, and we already suffering with parking issues etc already
